verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a new interview] , [ARG0: Bill Gates] [V: disclosed] [ARG1: that Trump offered him the long - vacant White House science adviser position during a conversation in the Oval Office last month] .

In a new interview , Bill Gates disclosed that [ARG0: Trump] [V: offered] [ARG3: him] [ARG1: the long - vacant White House science adviser position] [ARGM-TMP: during a conversation in the Oval Office last month] .
